channel.title: Comments on: 10 things travel has taught me

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/10-things-travel-has-taught-me/#comment-153889">Victoria</a>.
Thank you Victoria!

item.title: By: Victoria
item.dc:creator: Victoria
item.description: I just came across the blog and wanted to say I love it. It's original and genuine, and the photographs are simply beautiful. I'll definitely be watching this space.
item.content:encoded: I just came across the blog and wanted to say I love it. It’s original and genuine, and the photographs are simply beautiful. I’ll definitely be watching this space.

item.title: By: Marko @ Travel Photo Blogging
item.dc:creator: Marko @ Travel Photo Blogging
item.description: I really love this photo - it is as crisp as it could be and those people on the left really put things in perspective. Great work!
item.content:encoded: I really love this photo – it is as crisp as it could be and those people on the left really put things in perspective. Great work!
